preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from clinlims.type_of_sample where description = 'Tissue antemortem';

column.name: name_localization_id
column.valueComputed: (select id from localization where english = 'Tissue antemortem' and description = 'sampleType name' limit 1)

column.name: sample_type_id
column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.type_of_sample where description = 'Tissue antemortem' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.test where description = 'Histopathology examination' )
